name: Advanced Legal Issues
description: This course will build on the foundations established in CCT206H5. Issues relating to the protection of digital rights, taxation, privacy, jurisdiction and regulation will be examined in detail through the use of recent legal scholarship and evolving case law. [24L]
exclusions: JGM291H5; MGM390H5, MGM393H5, MGM394H5, MGM423H5, MGM429H5
